sign_in_prompt.title: Sign in
sign_in_prompt.description: Sign in to view your order history and checkout faster.

cart_mismatch_alert.title: Transfer Warning
cart_mismatch_alert.description: An error occurred while trying to transfer your cart

logout.title: Are you sure?
logout.description: After logging out, you will need to log in again to access your account. Any unsaved data may be lost.

meta.title: Page Not Found
meta.description: The page you are looking for does not exist. Please return to the homepage.

content.title: Page Not Found
content.message: The page you are looking for does not exist. Please return to the homepage.

meta.title: Home
meta.description: Discover the most popular products and don’t miss the deals! Everything you need is here with secure shopping and fast delivery.

detail.title: Transfer request for order {id}
detail.description: You have received a request to transfer the ownership of order ({id}). If you agree, you can approve the transfer by clicking the button below.
detail.message_1: If you accept, the new owner will assume all responsibilities and permissions related to this order.
detail.message_2: If you do not accept or wish to keep ownership, no further action is required.

success.title: Your order has been transferred!
success.description: Order {id} was successfully transferred to the new owner.

error.description: An error occurred while accepting the transfer. Please try again.

success.title: Order transfer declined!
success.description: The transfer of order {id} was successfully declined.

error.description: An error occurred while declining the transfer. Please try again.

content.title: Thank you!
content.description: Your order has been placed successfully.
content.email_send_message: We sent your order confirmation details to {email}.
content.created_message: Your order was successfully created on {date}

meta.title: Sign In
meta.description: Sign in to your account to view your orders, manage addresses, and personalize your shopping experience.

meta.title: Checkout
meta.description: Complete your purchase with secure checkout steps. Choose from credit card, debit card, or other payment methods to easily pay for your order.

meta.title: Shipping Addresses
meta.description: View and update your shipping addresses, add as many as you want. Once saved, addresses will be available during checkout.

not_found.title: No saved addresses found
not_found.description: You haven’t added a shipping address yet. Add one to complete your orders easily.

meta.title: Country/Region & Language
meta.description: Manage your country/region and language settings.

meta.title: Account
meta.description: View your account details, saved addresses, and recent orders on this page.

meta.title: Profile
meta.description: View and update your profile details including name, email, and phone number. You can also update your billing address or change your password.

description.password: For security reasons, the password is not displayed

meta.title: Orders
meta.description: View your past and current orders, track shipping status, and access order details easily.

meta.title: Order #{number}
meta.description: View order #{number} details, check product information, and easily track shipping status.

label.information_sent: We sent your order confirmation details to {email}.

meta.title: My Cart
meta.description: View items in your cart, update quantities, and proceed securely to checkout.

not_found.title: Cart Not Found
not_found.message: Your cart is empty. Please add items to continue shopping.

sign_in_prompt.title: Sign in
sign_in_prompt.description: Sign in to view your order history and checkout faster.

fast_delivery.title: Fast Delivery
fast_delivery.description: Your package will arrive at your pickup point or home within 3-5 business days.

simple_exchanges.title: Simple Exchanges
simple_exchanges.description: Didn’t get the right fit? Don’t worry, we’ll replace your product with the right one.

easy_returns.title: Easy Returns
easy_returns.description: Return your product and get your money back. No questions asked; we’ll make sure your return is handled smoothly.

summary.title: Review
summary.description: By clicking Place Order, you confirm that you have read, understood, and accepted our Terms of Use, Sales Conditions, and Return Policy, and that you have read Medusa Store’s Privacy Policy.

label.sub_store: How would you like your order delivered?
label.sub_shipping_method: How would you like your order delivered?

summary.title: Shipping Address
summary.same_billing_address: Billing and shipping addresses are the same.

label.select_address: Hello {name}, would you like to use one of your saved addresses?
label.same_as_billing: Billing address is the same as shipping

login_form.error_message: An error occurred while logging in.

register_form.success_message: Your account has been created successfully.
register_form.error_message: An error occurred while creating your account.

login_view.title: Sign In
login_view.description: Sign in for an enhanced shopping experience.

register_view.title: Sign Up
register_view.description: Sign up to enhance your shopping experience.
register_view.agreement: By creating an account, you agree to Medusa Store’s <privacy_policy>Privacy Policy</privacy_policy> and <terms_of_use>Terms of Use</terms_of_use>.

dialog.title: Would you like to shop in {country}? After changing, you may need to sign up or log in again.
dialog.description: Product availability, prices, shipping fees, and taxes may change (including items in your cart).

add_address_dialog.title: Add Address
add_address_dialog.description: Please fill in your shipping address details completely.

update_address_dialog.title: Edit Address
update_address_dialog.description: Update your current address details or save changes.

message.success: Your address has been added successfully.
message.error: An error occurred while adding the address. Please try again.

message.success: Your address has been updated successfully.
message.error: An error occurred while updating the address. Please try again.

transfer_request_form.title: Order Transfer Request Form
transfer_request_form.description: Can’t find the order you’re looking for? Link an order to your account.
transfer_request_form.label: Order ID

message.error: An error occurred during the transfer
An error occurred while changing the password
An error occurred while updating the phone number
An error occurred while updating the email
An error occurred while saving changes

delete_button.title: Remove Item
delete_button.description: Are you sure you want to remove this item from your cart? This action cannot be undone.

related_products.title: Related Products
related_products.description: You might also be interested in these products.
